resources.string:
Enter your first name and last initial so that you can later identify your data set on iSENSE.
Press and hold the Start button, and the app will record 10 seconds of acceleration data.
After recording, you may publish your data to isenseproject.org. You are also given an option to view your data.
You may modify various settings -- explore the menus.
If setting up your own project: create fields named \"Time\" (time/milliseconds) and any of \"X\", \"Y\", \"Z\", and \"Accel-Magnitude\" (all Acceleration/meters per second squared).\n
Please carefully review the following agreement for this version of this app:
Upload Data or Throw It Away
Could not connect to the internet through either wifi or mobile service.You will not be able to upload data to iSENSE until either is enabled.
Would you like to use the app in save mode instead?
